
[:python_version >= "3.10"]
numpy

[:python_version >= "3.6" and python_version < "3.7"]
numpy<=1.19.5

[:python_version >= "3.7" and python_version < "3.8"]
numpy<=1.21.6

[:python_version >= "3.8" and python_version < "3.10"]

[:sys_platform == "win32" and python_version >= "3.10"]
